author: jessewilson
msg: Changing timers so timer threads die if ever timer tasks throw unchecked exceptions. Previously we kept the timer alive (not consistent with RI) and suppressed an exception (bad user experience). With this change, once a timer task fails, its timer will no longer accept new tasks.

author: bago
msg: Add svn:mime-type text/html property to html (so to be able to review directly from svn)

author: lu4242
msg: PropertyResolver should return null when base or property is null, without invoke ELResolver
